mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (title, isbn, author, published_year, price, category) VALUES (#{title}, #{isbn}, #{author}, #{publishedYear}, #{price}, #{category})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, isbn, author, published_year, price, category FROM book
SELECT category.category_name FROM category WHERE id = #{categoryId}
SELECT COUNT(*),book.author FROM book WHERE author=#{author} GROUP BY author
SELECT COUNT(*),book.published_year FROM book WHERE published_year=#{publishedYear} GROUP BY published_year
SELECT COUNT(*),book.category FROM book WHERE category=#{category} GROUP BY category
